abstracts.cdata!:
The Power Sector Engineering and
            Technical Assistance Project will help rehabilitate existing
            thermal generation and distribution system facilities,
            support institutional improvements in the power second
            complete preparation of the Bumbuna hydroelectric project.
            It will include the following components: (a) spare parts
            and materials for the King Tom diesel generating station and
            the power distribution system, and equipment to improve the
            water cooling system of the King Tom station; (b) 10
            man-years of expert assistance to help establish and staff
            the NPA; (c) overseas training for NPA staff; (d)
            consultants' services to complete detailed engineering
            for the proposed Bumbuna hydroelectric project; (e) the
            services of a Bumbuna Engineering Review Board; and (f) a
            study to assess the impact of the Bumbuna hydroelectric
            project on the Freetown oil refinery.
